Rumor MotoGP: Yamaha Bingung Lepas Rossi atau Vinales
01 Nov 2019, 08:28 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Valentino Rossi dan Maverick Vinales memiliki kontrak hingga MotoGP 2020. (KARIM JAAFAR / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Direktur Pelaksana Yamaha Monster Energy, Lin Jarvis, mengatakan pihaknya belum menentukan antara mempertahankan Valentino Rossi atau Maverick Vinales usai MotoGP 2020.Kontrak Rossi dan Vinales bersama Yamaha akan berakhir usai MotoGP 2020. Rumor yang beredar Vinales menjadi salah satu pebalap incaran Ducati setelah Yamaha hampir pasti mempromosikan Fabio Quartararo dari Yamaha Petronas.Jarvis dalam wawancara dengan MarcaÂ mengatakan hingga kini Yamaha belum memutuskan posisi pebalap untuk MotoGP 2021. Satu yang hampir pasti, dikatakan Jarvis, Yamaha akan mempromosikan Quartararo."Terlalu dini untuk membicarakan MotoGP 2021. Pertanyaannya adalah apakah yang akan terjadi untuk rencana musim 2021. Logisnya tim pabrikan menginginkan dua pebalap cepat dan kompetitif, Quartararo jelas pebalap yang sangat menarik, sangat cepat," ujar Jarvis.



"Jadi logis bagi Yamaha setelah menghabiskan dua musim di tim satelit, Quartararo ingin memperkuat tim pabrikan. Tentu kami tertarik kepadanya," sambung Jarvis.Dengan posisi Quartararo yang kuat, maka Yamaha harus memilih Rossi atau Vinales untuk melengkapi pebalap di MotoGP 2021. Jarvis pun mengatakan baik Rossi dan Vinales sama-sama punya nilai lebih."Vinales sangat menarik, karena dia sangat cepat dan punya pengalaman empat tahun. Ketika Vinales berada di zonanya, dia sangat kompetitif, dan saya masih yakin dia bisa merebut gelar juara dunia. Jadi Vinales sangat menarik perhatian kami," ucap Jarvis."Rossi juga sangat menarik untuk alasan berbeda. Dia sering tampil kompetitif, dan dia jelas pebalap top di antara pebalap top. Yang menjadi pertanyaan adalah, apakah dia akan pensiun atau tidak. Kita masih harus menunggu," sambung pria asal Inggris itu.Lebih lanjut Jarvis tidak memungkiri masalah penentuan pebalap untuk MotoGP 2021 bisa menjadi masalah buat Yamaha."Saat ini kami tidak memiliki masalah dan kami tidak harus membuat keputusan saat ini. Tapi, ke depannya ini bisa menjadi masalah," ujar Jarvis.Live streaming MotoGP Malaysia 2019, Minggu (3/11), bisa disaksikan melalui CNNIndonesia.com. Sementara siaran langsung balapan bisa disaksikan melalui Trans7. (har)

MotoGP Rumors: Yamaha Confused Remove Rossi or Vinales
01 Nov 2019, 08:28 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Valentino Rossi and Maverick Vinales have contracts until MotoGP 2020. (KARIM JAAFAR / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Yamaha Monster Energy's Managing Director, Lin Jarvis, said his side had not yet determined whether to retain Valentino Rossi or Maverick Vinales after MotoGP 2020. Rossi and Vinales contracts with Yamaha will end after MotoGP 2020. Rumors circulating Vinales became one of the racers Ducati's target after Yamaha is almost certain to promote Fabio Quartararo from Yamaha Petronas. Jarvis in an interview with Marca said that until now Yamaha has not yet decided the racer's position for MotoGP 2021. One that is almost certain, Jarvis said, Yamaha will promote Quartararo. "It's too early to talk about MotoGP 2021 "The question is what will happen for the 2021 season plan. Logically the factory team wants two fast and competitive riders, Quartararo is clearly a very attractive racer, very fast," Jarvis said.



"So it is logical for Yamaha after spending two seasons on the satellite team, Quartararo wants to strengthen the manufacturer's team. Of course we are interested in him," continued Jarvis. With Quartararo's strong position, Yamaha must choose Rossi or Vinales to complete the riders in MotoGP 2021. Jarvis too said both Rossi and Vinales both had more value. "Vinales is very interesting, because he is very fast and has four years experience. When Vinales was in his zone, he was very competitive, and I still believe he could win the world title. So Vinales very interesting to us, "said Jarvis." Rossi is also very interesting for different reasons. He often appears competitive, and he is clearly the top racer among the top riders. The question is whether he will retire or not. We still have to wait, "continued the British man. Furthermore Jarvis did not deny the problem of determining the rider for MotoGP 2021 could be a problem for Yamaha." At the moment we are not have a problem and we don't have to make a decision at this time. But, in the future this could be a problem, "Jarvis said.
